titleInfo.title: It's Magic featuring Wandi the Magician

mods.abstract: Two color (red and black on grey) window card announcing J. Wilkins and Company 120 minute Musical Magical Extravaganza "It's Magic" featuring Wandi The Magician; Col. Bill Boley, president of the International Ventriloquist Association and the Dancing Wandettes. Event hosted at the Goodnight Auditorium on Saturday, August 12. Sponsored by the Franklin Shrine Club. Proceeds benefit Franklin Shrine Charity Projects. Features a metal photoplate of Jim Wilkins.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
